member.name: M:Infragistics.Collections.ObservableItemCollection.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Prevents change notifications (e.g. and ) from being raised.

remarks.para: The method must be called exactly once for each time that the BeginUpdate method is called.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Collections.ObservableItemCollection.EndUpdate
member.summary: Resumes change notifications (e.g. and ).

remarks.para: The method must be called exactly once for each time that the BeginUpdate method is called.

member.summary: The item is not checkable

member.summary: The item is checkable and may be independantly checked or unchecked without affecting other items.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.RadialMenuCheckBehavior.RadioButton
member.summary: The item is checkable. Only 1 item from the items with the same GroupName may be checked at a time and the checked item may not be unchecked.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.RadialMenuCheckBehavior.RadioButtonAllowAllUp
member.summary: The item is checkable. Only 1 item from the items with the same GroupName may be checked at a time and the checked item may not be checked allowing all items to be unchecked.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu
member.summary: Represents a circular menu control similar to that used in Microsoft's One Note MX.

remarks.p: The XamRadialMenu has a button within the center that is used to open and close the menu to display the child items. There are several properties to control the appearance of the center button. The property defines the content of the center button. Once the user navigates to the children of an item, the content is replaced by the which by default displays a back arrow.

The radial menu may be opened or closed via several triggers such as clicking the center button, pressing the character while in key tip mode, using the Space or Enter key while the center button is focused or programatically using the property. The and events are raised when the menu is opened and closed respectively.

The children of the radial menu are displayed in wedges/slices around the center button. By default the number of wedges is based upon the number and placement of the visible child items at each level. One can force a minimum number of wedges using the . By default, the children are arranged starting at the top but the starting rotation may be controlled using the and properties. The and determine the position and number of wedges that the item should span.

The radial menu is populated with child item by either adding objects to the property or by setting the . The containers expected for the radial menu children are classes deriving from such as , , , , and . When using the ItemsSource by default a RadialMenuItem will be created to represent each item in the provided collection. One can control the type of container created using the and properties.

member.summary: Returns or sets the width of the center button content.

member.summary: Returns or sets the height of the center button content.

member.summary: Returns or sets the template used to supply the content when navigating back.

member.summary: Returns or sets the background of the center button of the menu when the IsOpen property is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.CenterButtonClosedStroke
member.summary: Returns or sets the brush used for the outline of the ring of the center button when the IsOpen property is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.CenterButtonFill
member.summary: Returns or sets the background of the center button of the menu when the IsOpen property is true.

member.summary: Returns or sets the background of the center button of the menu when under the pointer.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.CenterButtonHotTrackStroke
member.summary: Returns or sets the brush used for the outline of the ring of the center button when under the pointer.

member.summary: Returns or sets the content for the center button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.CenterButtonKeyTip
member.summary: Returns or sets the keytip for the center button of the menu.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.CenterButtonStroke
member.summary: Returns or sets the brush used for the outline of the ring of the center button when the IsOpen is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.CenterButtonStrokeThickness
member.summary: Returns or sets the width of the outline of the inner rings of the menu.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.CurrentOpenMenuItem
member.summary: Returns or sets the menu item whose children are currently displayed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.IsOpen
member.summary: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether the items of the menu are currently displayed. When closed, only the center button is rendered.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.KeyTipTemplate
member.summary: Returns or sets the DataTemplate used to provide the look for the keytips.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.MenuBackground
member.summary: Returns or sets the brush for the backing of the radial menu.

member.summary: Returns or sets the duration of the animation performed when the IsOpen property is changed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.MenuItemOpenCloseAnimationEasingFunction
member.summary: Returns or sets the easing function applied to the animation that occurs when the IsOpen property is changed.

member.summary: Returns or sets the duration of the animation performed when the IsOpen property is changed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.MenuOpenCloseAnimationEasingFunction
member.summary: Returns or sets the easing function applied to the animation that occurs when the IsOpen property is changed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamRadialMenu.MinWedgeCount
member.summary: Returns or sets the minimum number of wedges displayed by the menu.

member.summary: Returns or sets the background of the outer ring of the menu.

member.summary: Returns or sets the thickness of the outer ring of the menu.

member.summary: Returns or sets the brush used for the outline of the outer ring.

member.summary: Returns or sets the starting angle of the items in degrees.

member.summary: Returns or sets the starting angle of the items expressed as the percentage of the width of a single wedge/slice.

member.summary: Returns or sets the amount of padding around each wedge in degrees.
